title: For Keeps. For Always.
description: Our friendship fell into our laps. The right place, the right time.We were for keeps. Until we blurred the line of love and friendship.Our love story hasn’t been easy.Right place. Wrong time. Wrong place. Right time.We’ve felt heartache as heavily as we’ve caused it.As deep as we love one another, we can’t seem to fight hard enough at the same time. Our friendship was for keeps.Will our love last for always?
author: Haley Jenner
